work.name: Orange County Lettings Project
highlights: >> Redesign of the modular architecture >> Use Dockers >> Addition of a CI/CD pipeline using CicleCI and Heroku
work.summary: Scale a Django application using a modular architecture Reduction of various technical debts on the project

work.name: Veeam Software
work.summary: Veeam Software, a socity which the global leader in data protection asked me to develop a small program that synchronizes two folders: source and replica. The program should maintain a full, identical copy of source folder at replica folder

work.name: SoftDesk_API_Project
highlights: >> Develop an API with Django REST Framework >> Use Inomnia to test the EndPoints.Create a documenter Insomnia
work.summary: Create a secure RESTful API using Django-Rest Framework

work.name: LITReview_Project
work.summary: Create a web application using Django to allow reviews or posts of book’s articles : . Backend based on Python and using Django Framework. Frontend based on Css, Html, js, . Db based on Sqlite3

work.name: Soflix_Project
work.summary: Develop a user interface for python website application like Netflix. Develop the frontend of an application with HTML and CSS. Interact with an API with Java Script
